A 32-bit signed integer that indicates the relative order of the instances being compared. The return value has the following meanings:
ValueMeaning
Less than zeroThis object is less than the parameter.

Greater than zeroThis object is greater than .

member.name: P:s3pi.GenericRCOLResource.Properties.Resources.RCOLResources
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to ;type ;tag (*=null) ;y=stand alone resource ;n=only embedded in a MODL or MLOD ;desc 0x015A1849 GEOM N Body Geometry ; lies! but the stand alone is not a GenericRCOL 0x01661233 MODL Y Object Geometry 0x01D0E6FB VBUF N Vertex Buffer 0x01D0E70F IBUF N Index Buffer 0x01D0E723 VRTF N Vertex Format 0x01D0E75D MATD Y Material definition 0x01D0E76B SKIN N Mesh skin 0x01D10F34 MLOD Y Object Geometry LODs 0x02019972 MTST Y Material set 0x021D7E8C TREE Y 0x0229684B VBUF N Vertex Buffer(Used in shadow m [rest of string was truncated]";.
